jackBeNimble

bitcoin order entry made simple
Usage
  • Toggle lot size using hotkeys.
  • Toggle offset to desired price offset.
  • Use the home keys on your keyboard for placing orders.
    1. Left hand places buy orders
    2. Right hand places sell orders
  • Cancel all orders using designated cancel key.
Buy Keybindings
Action Key
Buy at Market g
Bid 0.01 above best bid f
Bid with best bid d
Bid offset below best bid s
Bid 2x offset below best bid a
Sell Keybindings
Action Key
Sell at Market h
Offer 0.01 below best offer j
Offer with best offer k
Offer offset above best offer l
Offer 2x offset best offer ;
Cancel Keybindings
Action Key
Cancel All y
Cancel Last
Cancel Bids
Cancel Asks
Toggle Keybindings
Action Key
Increase Lotsize \
Decrease Lotsize '
Increase Offset -
Decrease Offset =
